programme.title: Shipbuilding In California
programme.short_synopsis: A recollection of the work of Henry Kaiser to improve the economy of California.
programme.medium_synopsis: The economic growth in California since 1967, the work of Henry Kaiser to bring a military shipbuilding industry to the state, and the closure of Yosemite National Park.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
